replies.author: 迷途的村庄
replies.txt_content:
flow：液体流动，包括waterflow和lavaflow
waterflow：水的流动
lavaflow：岩浆流动复制代码

/res set <领地名> [权限] [true/false/remove] - 设置某领地的权限
开启领地水流动:/res set <领地名> flow true

replies.author: Kobe1192887155
replies.txt_content: 在领地里输入/res set waterflow t

replies.author: Ghost__
replies.txt_content:
站在领地输入/res set flow t 这个是岩浆水都可以流动
或者输入/res set 领地名 flow t
